## Source Code

Python code

::: {style="font-size: 0.7em;"}
```{.python filename='fibo.py'}
def fibonacci(n):
    if n < 0:
        print('Incorrect input')
    elif n == 0:
        return 0
    elif n == 1 or n == 2:
        return 1
    else:
        return fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2)
```


R code  
```{.r filename='fibo.R' .small}
fibonacci <- function(n) {
  if (n <= 0) {
    return(NULL)
  } else if (n == 1) {
    return(0)
  } else if (n == 2) {
    return(1)
  } else {
    return(fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2))
  }
}
```
:::
